original_title: UFC: The Ultimate 100 Greatest Fights: Vol. 8
overview: Relive the best mixed martial arts beatdowns the Octagon has ever seen in this collection of fan favorites drawn from more than a decade of Ultimate Fighting Championship history, including action between Anderson Silva and Rich Franklin in UFC 64. Also included in Vol. 8 is The Ultimate Fighter 2 Finale: Sanches vs. Diaz, UFC 70: Gonzaga vs. Cro Cop, UFC Fight Night: Sanchez vs. Parisyan, and The Ultimate Fighter 1 Finale: Griffin vs. Bonnar.
title: UFC: The Ultimate 100 Greatest Fights: Vol. 8
